title: Furniture Removal in Bangkok
description: Old sofa, bed, or wardrobe? Get unwanted furniture picked up and removed from Bangkok condos, houses, and offices. Same-day available.
meta_title: Furniture Removal Bangkok | Old Sofa, Bed & Wardrobe Pickup | Bangkok Junk
meta_description: Old sofa, bed, or wardrobe? Get unwanted furniture picked up and removed from Bangkok condos, houses, and offices. Same-day available.
content:
New furniture arriving? The old piece gets taken away. Bangkok Junk provides fast, reliable furniture removal across Bangkok for condos, houses, townhouses, and shophouses. Whether it's a single sofa or an entire apartment full of IKEA furniture, the heavy lifting is handled so you don't have to.

The team knows how to navigate Bangkok's condo buildings. Juristic offices coordinated, service lifts booked, and common areas protected during removal. You don't need to worry about building rules or logistics.

items.title: Sofa
items.text: Old sofa blocking your living room? Sofas and sectionals of all sizes picked up across Bangkok, same-day available.

items.title: Bed Frame & Mattress
items.text: Full bed setups removed: frame, mattress, and base. Picked up from Bangkok condos and apartments.

items.title: Wardrobe
items.text: Large built-in or freestanding wardrobes removed safely, even from high-rise Bangkok condos with lift restrictions.

items.title: Dining Table & Chairs
items.text: Clear your dining room fast. Full dining sets removed from Bangkok homes and condos without fuss.

items.title: Desk
items.text: Old desk no longer needed? Office and home desks of all sizes picked up across Bangkok.

items.title: Bookshelf
items.text: Freestanding and modular bookshelves removed from Bangkok homes, offices, and condos.

items.title: Cabinet
items.text: Storage cabinets, TV cabinets, and display units. All types collected and disposed of across Bangkok.

items.title: IKEA Furniture
items.text: Moving out of a Bangkok condo full of IKEA pieces? This has been done hundreds of times and the team knows how to handle it fast.

items.title: Shoe Rack
items.text: Even smaller items are welcome. Shoe racks and hallway furniture picked up as part of any Bangkok removal job.

items.title: Coffee Table
items.text: Old coffee table on its way out? It gets taken away as a standalone pickup or as part of a larger Bangkok clearout.

highlight.title: IKEA Furniture Removal Specialist
highlight.text: Moving out of a Bangkok condo full of IKEA? This is handled constantly. Billy bookcases, Kallax shelves, Malm beds, Hemnes dressers. Every piece known, every removal fast. One truck, one trip, done.

meta.pricing: Pricing is based on volume, weight, and access difficulty, not by the hour. Send a photo on LINE or WhatsApp and get a clear, fixed quote before the team arrives. No hidden fees, no surprises.

faq.q: Can you remove a sofa from a high-floor condo?
faq.a: Yes. Service lift access is coordinated with your building's juristic office and all logistics are handled for you.

faq.q: Do you take apart large furniture?
faq.a: If needed, yes. The team can disassemble wardrobes, bed frames, and large shelving units for easier removal.
Usable items are donated or resold. Damaged items are recycled where possible and disposed of responsibly.
Same-day pickup is available depending on location and schedule. Most jobs are completed within 24 hours of booking.

title: Appliance Removal in Bangkok
description: Old fridge, washing machine, or AC? Large appliances removed and disposed of across Bangkok responsibly. Same-day pickup available.
meta_title: Appliance Removal Bangkok | Fridge, AC & Washer Pickup | Bangkok Junk
meta_description: Old fridge, washing machine, or AC? Large appliances removed and disposed of across Bangkok responsibly. Same-day pickup available.
content:
Getting a new appliance delivered? The old one gets taken away. Bangkok Junk removes all types of large appliances from condos, houses, townhouses, and offices across Bangkok. The heavy lifting, the logistics, and the responsible disposal are all handled for you.

Appliances like fridges and air conditioners contain refrigerants that require proper handling. Every appliance is disposed of in compliance with environmental standards, never dumped illegally.

items.title: Fridge
items.text: All fridge sizes removed, from bar fridges to large double-door models. Book a same-day fridge removal in Bangkok and the heavy lifting is handled for you.

items.title: Washing Machine
items.text: Old washing machine taking up space? Front-loaders and top-loaders picked up across Bangkok, fast.

items.title: Air Conditioner
items.text: Getting a new AC installed? The old unit gets removed at the same time, including wall-mounted and floor-standing models.

items.title: TV
items.text: From old CRT sets to large flat screens, old TVs collected and disposed of across Bangkok responsibly.

items.title: Water Heater
items.text: Old water heaters removed safely, including electric and gas models from Bangkok condos and houses.

items.title: Microwave & Oven
items.text: No need to lug it downstairs yourself. Old microwaves and ovens picked up from any floor.

items.title: Dryer
items.text: Moving on from your old dryer? It gets collected fast and disposed of properly in Bangkok.

items.title: Dishwasher
items.text: Old dishwasher sitting unused? The Bangkok team picks up and disposes of dishwashers of all brands and sizes.

items.title: Exercise Equipment
items.text: Treadmills, stationary bikes, and weight benches. Bulky exercise equipment removed from Bangkok condos and homes.

items.title: Water Dispenser
items.text: Old water dispensers and coolers picked up from homes and offices across Bangkok.

highlight.title: Responsible Disposal Guarantee
highlight.text: Fridges and air conditioners contain refrigerants that harm the environment if released. All appliances are disposed of properly through certified channels. Working appliances are donated where possible.

meta.pricing: Appliance removal pricing depends on the type, size, and number of units plus access difficulty. Send a photo and get a clear quote before the team arrives.

faq.q: Can you remove an AC unit from the wall?
faq.a: The indoor unit is removed. If the outdoor compressor also needs removal, that can be coordinated too.
Most appliances can be disconnected on-site. For gas or complex electrical disconnections, a licensed technician is recommended first.

faq.q: Can you time the pickup with my new delivery?
faq.a: Yes, this is done regularly. Just share your delivery window and the removal will be scheduled to match.
Yes, built-in ovens, dishwashers, and similar units can be removed. Just send a photo so the job can be assessed.

title: Full Property Clearout in Bangkok
description: Moving out, clearing a rental, or downsizing? Full condo, house, and shophouse clearouts handled across Bangkok. No sorting required.
meta_title: Property Clearout Bangkok | Condo, House & Shophouse | Bangkok Junk
meta_description: Moving out, clearing a rental, or downsizing? Full condo, house, and shophouse clearouts handled across Bangkok. No sorting required.
content:
Whether you're leaving a condo, resetting a rental house, clearing out a shophouse, or downsizing to a smaller place, the entire clearout is handled from start to finish. You don't need to sort anything. You don't need to move anything. Just point at what needs to go and the rest is taken care of.

The team has cleared hundreds of properties across Bangkok, from studio condos in Sukhumvit to multi-story shophouses in Chinatown. Juristic offices, service lifts, common area protection, and truck parking are all coordinated as part of the job. Every situation handled without judgment.

Full clearouts are the highest-volume service and the entire operation is built around making them fast, efficient, and stress-free for you.

items.title: Moving Out
items.text: Leaving your condo, house, or townhouse and need everything gone before handover? The full property cleared fast, ready for inspection.

items.title: Landlord Property Reset
items.text: Resetting a unit, house, or shophouse between tenants? All left-behind furniture and junk removed so your property is ready to re-let.

items.title: Expat Departure
items.text: Leaving Thailand for good? Your entire home cleared: condo, house, or townhouse. So you can focus on your move, not the mess.

items.title: Post-Renovation Clearout
items.text: Renovation done but debris and old fixtures everywhere? Everything removed and the space left clean.

items.title: Accumulated Clutter
items.text: Years of stuff piled up and nowhere to start? Full clearouts handled regardless of how much there is.

items.title: Inherited Unit
items.text: Clearing a property after a family member has passed? Everything handled with care and discretion.

items.title: Downsizing
items.text: Moving to a smaller place and need to shed furniture fast? As much or as little as you need gone, picked up on your schedule.

items.title: New Tenant Move-In Prep
items.text: Taking over a furnished condo, house, or shophouse with pieces you don't want? Unwanted items removed before you settle in.

items.title: Home Office Clearout
items.text: Working from home left you with old equipment and furniture? Home offices cleared across Bangkok quickly.

items.title: Storage Room Clearout
items.text: That storage room you've been avoiding? It gets emptied completely and left usable again.

sections.heading: You Don't Need to Sort Anything
sections.text: This is important: you do not need to sort, organize, or categorize anything before the team arrives. Point at what needs to go and the rest is handled. Recyclables separated, usable items donated, and everything disposed of responsibly. You don't lift a finger.

sections.heading: Bangkok Buildings? No Problem
sections.text: Full property clearouts in Bangkok come with unique logistics. Condo juristic offices have rules about service lift booking, floor protection, working hours, and truck parking. All of this is handled as part of the job. Building management coordinated, floor protection laid down, and everything done within the building's permitted hours.

meta.pricing: Clearout pricing is based on the total volume of items, the number of truck loads required, and access difficulty. Send photos of every room and get a comprehensive quote. For large jobs, an in-person assessment can be arranged before quoting.

faq.q: How long does a full clearout take?
faq.a: A studio or one-bedroom condo typically takes 2-3 hours. Larger properties may take a full day. A time estimate is included with every quote.

faq.q: Do I need to be present during the clearout?
faq.a: It helps if you can be there at the start to walk the team through what stays and what goes. After that, you can leave if you prefer.

faq.q: Can you clear a property if I'm already overseas?
faq.a: Yes. Coordination with your building management or agent can be arranged to access the property. This has been done many times for expats who have already left Thailand.

faq.q: Do you clean after the clearout?
faq.a: The space is left broom-clean. If you need a full deep clean afterward, a partner service can be recommended.

Closing an office, downsizing, or upgrading your workspace? Bangkok Junk handles commercial clearouts across Bangkok, from single-room offices to full-floor removals. Everything scheduled around your business hours so there's zero disruption to your operations.

Bangkok's mixed-use buildings have loading dock hours, lift restrictions, and specific rules for commercial waste. All of this is navigated for you. The team coordinates with building management to ensure smooth, compliant removal every time.

items.title: Office Desks
items.text: Old office desks of all sizes removed, from single units to full-floor clearouts across Bangkok.

items.title: Office Chairs
items.text: Replacing your office seating? Old office chairs picked up in bulk from Bangkok offices and co-working spaces.

meta.pricing: Office clearout pricing is based on volume and access logistics. An on-site visit to assess the job can be arranged before quoting. All pricing is transparent and confirmed before work begins.

faq.q: Can you work outside business hours?
faq.a: Yes. Evening and weekend clearouts are done regularly to avoid disrupting your team's workday.
Secure data destruction for hard drives and storage media can be coordinated through certified partners.

faq.q: How quickly can you clear a full office?
faq.a: Depending on size, most office clearouts are completed in one day. Large multi-floor jobs may take 2-3 days.

description: Overwhelmed by accumulated stuff? Hoarding cleanouts handled across Bangkok with compassion and zero judgment. Discreet, professional service.

title: Full Condo Clearout in Sukhumvit Soi 36
description: A two-bedroom condo on Sukhumvit Soi 36 cleared out. All furniture, appliances, and accumulated items removed in one trip.
meta_title: Condo Clearout Sukhumvit Soi 36 | Case Study | Bangkok Junk
meta_description: Full two-bedroom condo clearout on Sukhumvit Soi 36. All furniture, appliances, and accumulated items removed in a single trip by Bangkok Junk.
content:
An expat family was leaving Bangkok and needed their entire two-bedroom condo cleared before the lease handover. The property had accumulated years of furniture, appliances, and personal items, including a large L-shaped sofa, double fridge, washing machine, and wardrobes in both bedrooms.

The Job

The building's juristic office at 15 Residences was coordinated with to book the service lift for the morning. A team of four arrived at 9am, wrapped the lift interior with protective padding, and began clearing from the bedrooms first.

The entire job took about 3 hours. Every item was carried down to the truck in the loading area, including the sofa which required careful maneuvering through the corridor. By noon the condo was completely empty and ready for inspection.

Items Removed

  • L-shaped sofa and coffee table
  • Queen bed and single bed with mattresses
  • Two wardrobes
  • Double-door fridge
  • Washing machine
  • Dining table with 4 chairs
  • Multiple boxes of household items

Usable items were donated. The fridge and washing machine were sent for proper recycling.

Need a full property clearout in Sukhumvit? Get a free quote.

title: Sofa and Wardrobe Removal in Thonglor
description: Quick furniture pickup in Thonglor. Old sofa and wardrobe removed from a high-rise condo to make way for new furniture delivery.
meta_title: Furniture Removal Thonglor | Sofa & Wardrobe Pickup | Bangkok Junk
meta_description: Quick furniture pickup in Thonglor. Old sofa and wardrobe removed from a high-rise condo to make way for new furniture delivery.
content:
A resident in a Thonglor high-rise had a new sofa being delivered the following day and needed the old 3-seater gone that afternoon. They also wanted a freestanding wardrobe removed from the bedroom.

The Job

The team arrived within 2 hours of the LINE message. The sofa was carried down via the service lift after coordinating with the building's front desk. The wardrobe was partially disassembled on site to fit through the bedroom doorway. Total time on site: about 90 minutes.

Items Removed

  • 3-seater fabric sofa
  • Freestanding wardrobe

The sofa was in good condition and was donated. The wardrobe was recycled.

Need furniture removal in Thonglor? Book a pickup.

title: Office Clearout in Sathorn Business Tower

A small company was closing their Sathorn office and needed everything removed before their lease ended. The office spanned half a floor and included 40 desks, ergonomic chairs, filing cabinets, a server rack, printers, and kitchen equipment.

The Job

The clearout was scheduled over a weekend to avoid disrupting other tenants in the building. The team worked with building management to book the loading dock and freight lift for both days. All IT equipment was separated for certified e-waste disposal.

Items Removed

  • 40 office desks
  • 40 ergonomic chairs
  • 12 filing cabinets
  • Server rack and networking equipment
  • 3 large printers
  • Kitchen appliances and furniture

Need an office clearout in Sathorn? Get a free quote.

title: About Bangkok Junk
description: Bangkok Junk is a professional junk removal service covering Bangkok, Samut Prakan, and Nonthaburi. English and Thai-speaking team.
meta_title: About Bangkok Junk | Professional Junk Removal Service
meta_description: Bangkok Junk is a professional junk removal service covering Bangkok, Samut Prakan, and Nonthaburi. English and Thai-speaking team.
content:
Bangkok Junk is part of the Khun Clean family of service brands operating across Bangkok. The focus: junk removal, picking up and disposing of unwanted furniture, appliances, and property contents for homeowners, renters, landlords, and businesses.

What Bangkok Junk Does

Things you no longer need, removed. That might be a single sofa or an entire property's contents. The heavy lifting, the logistics, and the responsible disposal are all taken care of. You just point at what needs to go.

The Team

The team speaks both English and Thai. Every unique challenge of working in Bangkok is understood: condo building rules, juristic offices, lift restrictions, and truck access. Hundreds of jobs completed across every major district and property type.

Responsible Disposal

Nothing just gets dumped in a landfill. Usable items are donated to charities and community organizations. Recyclable materials are separated and sent to proper facilities. Appliances containing refrigerants are handled through certified disposal channels. This is taken seriously.

Service Area

All of Bangkok, Samut Prakan, and Nonthaburi covered. The busiest areas include Sukhumvit, Thonglor, Silom, Sathorn, Ekkamai, Asok, On Nut, and Phra Khanong, but the team goes wherever the job is.

title: Junk Removal in Sukhumvit, Bangkok
description: Fast junk removal in Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Condos, offices, and apartments cleared along the BTS corridor. Same-day pickup available. Get a free quote today.
meta_title: Junk Removal in Sukhumvit Bangkok | Same Day Pickup | Bangkok Junk
meta_description: Fast junk removal in Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Condos, offices, and apartments cleared along the BTS corridor. Same-day pickup available. Get a free quote today.
content:
Fast, reliable junk removal across Sukhumvit, one of Bangkok's busiest and most sought-after expat corridors. Whether you're in a high-rise condo near Nana or a townhouse off Sukhumvit Soi 77, the team knows how to navigate the area's building rules and traffic patterns to get your job done efficiently.

Sukhumvit residents frequently upgrade furniture, replace appliances, and move between apartments. All of it handled: single-item pickups, full condo clearouts, and everything in between.

From Asok all the way to On Nut, Sukhumvit is the most active service area. The loading bays, juristic offices, and building requirements along this corridor are well-known, and pickups are coordinated with minimal disruption.

Services Available in Sukhumvit

  • Furniture removal in Sukhumvit
  • Appliance removal in Sukhumvit
  • Condo clearout in Sukhumvit
  • Office clearout in Sukhumvit
  • Mattress removal in Sukhumvit
  • AC removal in Sukhumvit
